name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven System Level Go Developer with 13+ years of experience in system development and a strong focus on **Go** programming. Proficient in **Kubernetes** for orchestration and managing **system containers**, with a hands-on approach to **network configuration**, **resource allocation models**, and **storage devices** management. Skilled in leveraging **Ubuntu** environments for efficient deployment and operations.

Experienced in employing **DevOps** practices to enhance system performance and streamline workflows, with a comprehensive understanding of **version control systems** and **VMware** for virtual resource management. Strong analytical skills with a system thinking mindset, dedicated to optimizing container resource interaction to support high-performance applications.

Additionally, well-versed in developing applications using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, enhancing backend and frontend capabilities through frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**. Proven track record in AI/ML integration and cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
